abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg and United States Interior Secretary Ken Salazar pledge to coordinate their efforts in order to clean up Jamaica Bay in Queens and improve public access; announcement comes after years of efforts by city officials, environmentalists and nonprofit groups to protect area.
snippet: The bay, a key bird habitat, has suffered from proximity to Kennedy Airport and the patchwork quality of surrounding parklands.
lead_paragraph: The bay, a key bird habitat, has suffered from proximity to Kennedy Airport and the patchwork quality of surrounding parklands.

headline.main: U.S. and N.Y.C. Unite to Aid Jamaica Bay
headline.print_headline: U.S. and City Unite to Aid Jamaica Bay
headline.seo: U.S. and N.Y.C. to Coordinate Jamaica Bay Parklands
